conclusion: Xiao Ming runs at speed \( v_1 \) on the beach, Xiao Zhang falls into the water at point B, and the path from A to B involves reflection at point 3.
The angle of incidence \(\theta_1\) is equal to the angle of reflection \(\theta_2\).
Since \(\theta_1 = \theta_2\), the angles of incidence and reflection are equal.
The ratio of the speeds \( v_1 / v_2 \) is equal to the ratio of the angles of incidence and reflection.
Given \( v_1 > v_2 \), the ratio \( \frac{v_1}{v_2} \) is \( \frac{v_1}{v_2} = \frac{\theta_1}{\theta_2} \).
